pr_title: Use ArtemisMetricCategory as the source for valid metric categories.

timeline.message:
Use ArtemisMetricCategory as the source for valid metric categories.

 - due to dependencies continue to export strings to the lower levels.

 - Update the default categories in the config.yaml to contain no invalid values.

 - set the default prometheus categories to at least include the beacon category.

 Addresses #1619

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.body:
I'd suggest defaulting to enabling all metrics. I hadn't noticed that we'd disabled them all by default.  

```suggestion
  public static final List<ArtemisMetricCategory> DEFAULT_METRICS_CATEGORIES = new ArrayList<>(EnumSet.allOf(ArtemisMetricCategory.class));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:

public static final List<ArtemisMetricCategory> DEFAULT_METRICS_CATEGORIES = List.of(BEACON);
